Showers early then partly cloudy overnight PERIOD Low around 50F PERIOD Winds S at  to  mph PERIOD Chance of rain  PERIOD

Updated November     pm











Entering teaching assistant Rachel Sanders quiz section on a Wednesday morning one might have easily mistaken Introduction to Political Theory for Football  PERIOD Students happily discuss the current season with her before class starts and its easy to discern the positive connection Sanders has created in only a couple sessions PERIOD

The laziness of summer hangs on the first week of fall quarter yet the eagerness to get class started is evident on every students face PERIOD Sanders begins by making sure she knows everyones name PERIOD When she stumbles on names right away she is quick to engage the class and learn them again PERIOD

Mackenzie Powell a sophomore in Sanders  a.m PERIOD quiz section appreciates that her teaching assistant pays rapt attention to the classroom and to her students PERIOD

 Powell said PERIOD 

Learning names is only part of being a great teacher and Sanders takes her job as a TA very seriously PERIOD She realizes that being in the position to have a more personal and educational experience with students on such a large campus has a huge influence on how open students are to learning PERIOD

 Sanders said PERIOD 

When classes are finished Sanders continues to work for her students while managing her own studies as well by planning her next discussion and grading papers PERIOD As a TA time management is crucial and Sanders takes pride in her ability to get things done PERIOD

Assistant professor Jack Turner whom Sanders is a TA for is aware of the amount of time and effort that she puts into school PERIOD

 Turner said PERIOD 

Sanders day begins at  a.m PERIOD when she goes to the gym to work out PERIOD This is her personal time the time she enjoys the most outside of the school atmosphere PERIOD After that she reads for her own courses which include a geography seminar called  and an urban theory and core political theory seminar PERIOD Then Sanders heads to the lectures or quiz sections she is teaching PERIOD

Sanders hangs out in the department computer lab because it is a good way to socialize with people in her department PERIOD Sometimes she will head to her favorite cafe in her neighborhood or spend time in Fremont PERIOD

These places allow her to tackle her own workload as a graduate student PERIOD She admits that it is sometimes tough especially when graded assignments are due for her students PERIOD

At the end of the day she will either work out at a private gym in Fremont or go home to a house she shares with a coworker PERIOD She or her coworker will make dinner in the evening and watch television PERIOD She really enjoys when she can cook for her friends or they can go out together PERIOD

 Sanders said PERIOD 

Though Sanders workload of two graduate courses per quarter and teaching  hours a week is sometimes tough at the end of the day the focus is on her students PERIOD

The hope Sanders has is that her students will continue to use her as a resource after the course is over PERIOD Sanders realizes that professors have a profound impact on people and that they have the ability to change the way people think about the world PERIOD This reasoning explains why Sanders is in school and teaching today PERIOD

 Sanders explained PERIOD

Sanders loves to see students interacting with each other PERIOD One of the things that she has learned is that it is best for her not to put on authoritative airs in the classroom and to just be herself PERIOD

She believes this leads to students having more confidence with her increasing participation and discussion PERIOD Sanders appreciates when students can talk to each other for answers but shes confident she has much to learn as well PERIOD

 she explains PERIOD 

Acceptance as a teacher was something Sanders was afraid of when she first became a TA PERIOD Sanders has grown since then and she brings herself ease of mind knowing she is always better prepared than her undergraduates and in that she hopes to build longlasting relationships with the people she teaches and assists PERIOD

 Turner said PERIOD 

Reach contributing writer Mary Jean Spadafora at lifestylesdailyuw.com PERIOD
